content: The Connectathon Management stream has been added to support communications leading up to and during the various FHIR connectathons - both HL7-sponsored ones and others. https://chat.fhir.org/#narrow/stream/connectathon%20mgmt
I have created a new stream "r2:r3 conversions" for working on creating and testing Mapping language transformations from r2 to r3 and vice versa. Anyone is welcome to join
